breakfast.title: Greek Yogurt Protein Bowl
breakfast.description: Creamy Greek yogurt topped with nuts, seeds, and berries for a protein-packed start.
instructions: Mix 1 cup Greek yogurt with 1 scoop vanilla protein powder
Top with 2 tbsp mixed nuts and 1 tbsp chia seeds
Add 1/2 cup fresh berries
Drizzle with 1 tbsp honey if desired

lunch.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast with romaine lettuce and Caesar dressing in a whole wheat tortilla.
instructions: Season 6 oz chicken breast with salt and pepper, grill for 6-7 minutes per side
Let chicken rest 2 minutes, then slice
Toss 2 cups romaine lettuce with 2 tbsp Caesar dressing
Place chicken and lettuce in large whole wheat tortilla, roll tightly

dinner.title: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
dinner.description: Tender beef strips with broccoli in a savory sauce served over brown rice.
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp oil in large pan, cook 6 oz sliced beef sirloin for 3-4 minutes
Add 3 cups broccoli florets, stir-fry 3 minutes
Mix 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce, 1 tsp garlic powder
Add sauce to pan, cook 2 minutes until thickened
Serve over 1 cup cooked brown rice

breakfast.title: Scrambled Egg Protein Wrap
breakfast.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs with cheese and spinach wrapped in a high-protein tortilla.
instructions: Whisk 3 whole eggs with 2 egg whites, salt and pepper
Scramble eggs in buttered pan over medium heat for 3-4 minutes
Add 1 cup fresh spinach, cook until wilted
Place eggs in protein tortilla, top with 2 tbsp shredded cheese
Roll wrap and serve immediately

lunch.title: Tuna and White Bean Salad
lunch.description: Protein-rich tuna mixed with white beans, vegetables, and olive oil dressing.
instructions: Drain 2 cans tuna in water and 1 can white beans
Mix tuna and beans in large bowl
Add diced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion
Whisk 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt and pepper
Toss salad with dressing and serve over mixed greens

dinner.title: Baked Salmon with Sweet Potato
dinner.description: Herb-crusted salmon fillet with roasted sweet potato and green beans.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F, season 6 oz salmon with herbs, salt and pepper
Cut 1 medium sweet potato into cubes, toss with oil and roast 20 minutes
Place salmon on baking sheet, bake 12-15 minutes
Steam 1 cup green beans for 5 minutes until tender
Serve salmon with sweet potato and green beans

breakfast.title: Cottage Cheese Pancakes
breakfast.description: Fluffy high-protein pancakes made with cottage cheese and topped with berries.
instructions: Blend 1 cup cottage cheese, 3 eggs, 1/4 cup oats, and 1 tsp vanilla
Heat non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour batter to make 4 small pancakes, cook 3 minutes per side
Top with 1/2 cup fresh berries and 1 tbsp maple syrup

lunch.title: Turkey and Hummus Power Bowl
lunch.description: Sliced turkey breast with quinoa, vegetables, and hummus for sustained energy.
instructions: Cook 1/2 cup quinoa according to package directions
Slice 5 oz deli turkey breast
Arrange turkey, quinoa, diced cucumber, and cherry tomatoes in bowl
Add 3 tbsp hummus and 1 tbsp sunflower seeds
Drizzle with lemon juice and serve

dinner.title: Chicken and Black Bean Quesadilla
dinner.description: Grilled chicken with black beans and cheese in a crispy whole wheat tortilla.
instructions: Cook 5 oz diced chicken breast in pan with taco seasoning, 8 minutes
Mash 1/2 cup black beans slightly, mix with chicken
Layer chicken mixture and 1/4 cup cheese between 2 tortillas
Cook quesadilla in pan 3 minutes per side until crispy
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa and Greek yogurt

breakfast.title: Protein Smoothie Bowl
breakfast.description: Thick protein smoothie topped with granola and fresh fruit for a filling breakfast.
instructions: Blend 1 banana, 1 cup milk, 1 scoop protein powder, and ice until thick
Pour into bowl and smooth top
Sprinkle with 2 tbsp granola and sliced strawberries
Add 1 tbsp almond butter and serve immediately

lunch.title: Lentil and Vegetable Soup
lunch.description: Hearty red lentil soup with vegetables and a side of Greek yogurt.
instructions: Sauté diced onion, carrot, and celery in pot with oil, 5 minutes
Add 1 cup red lentils, 3 cups vegetable broth, diced tomatoes
Simmer 15 minutes until lentils are tender
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs
Serve with 1/2 cup Greek yogurt on the side

dinner.title: Pork Tenderloin with Quinoa
dinner.description: Seasoned pork tenderloin with herbed quinoa and roasted Brussels sprouts.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F, season 6 oz pork tenderloin with garlic powder and herbs
Sear pork in oven-safe pan 3 minutes, then bake 15 minutes
Cook 1/2 cup quinoa with broth, add fresh herbs
Roast halved Brussels sprouts with oil, 20 minutes
Let pork rest 5 minutes before slicing, serve with quinoa and sprouts

breakfast.title: Breakfast Burrito Bowl
breakfast.description: Scrambled eggs with black beans, cheese, and avocado over hash browns.
instructions: Cook frozen hash browns in pan according to package directions
Scramble 3 eggs with 2 tbsp milk in separate pan
Warm 1/2 cup black beans in microwave
Layer hash browns, eggs, beans, and 2 tbsp cheese in bowl
Top with diced avocado and salsa

lunch.title: Chicken Salad Lettuce Wraps
lunch.description: Greek yogurt-based chicken salad wrapped in crisp lettuce leaves.
instructions: Dice 5 oz cooked chicken breast
Mix chicken with 3 tbsp Greek yogurt, diced celery, and grapes
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
Spoon mixture into large butter lettuce leaves
Sprinkle with chopped walnuts and serve

dinner.title: Shrimp and Vegetable Pasta
dinner.description: Garlic shrimp with zucchini noodles and whole wheat pasta in light sauce.
instructions: Cook 4 oz whole wheat pasta according to package directions
Sauté 6 oz shrimp with garlic and red pepper flakes, 4 minutes
Add spiralized zucchini to pan, cook 2 minutes
Toss pasta with shrimp, zucchini, olive oil, and lemon juice
Garnish with fresh herbs and parmesan cheese

Crispy Buffalo Chicken Potato Skins for Your Next Game Day
Chocolate Crepes With Strawberries and Cream You’ll Want for Breakfast and Dessert
